document_data.caption: A non-magical, but still mystifying, ladder of Elminster.
document_data.name: Ladder of Elminster
document_data.mainbody: A '''ladder of Elminster''' was a special kind of [[ladder]] used by some performers.
document_data.Uses: Popular with tumblers and [[acrobat]]s, these ladders were balanced so that a dextrous individual could climb up one side and down the other while the ladder was standing upright without leaning on a solid object. These ladders were classified into various skill levels for beginners at {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}}, masters at {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}}, and "mages" at {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Prices: A ladder of [[Elminster]] could be purchased through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] for 5 [[silver piece]]sâ€”8 [[gold piece]]s depending on its size.
